project_abstract.cdata: The project comprises the construction of a 500 kV transmission line from Xuzhou to Shanghai, installation of five substations and provision of associated equipment, consultant services, and training.  The project seeks to support industrial growth in East China by facilitating bulk power  transfer between optimal generating sites and demand centers.  It provides for the transfer of technology in extra high voltage (EHV) line and substation design, construction, operation and maintenance, overall system planning, investment programming and financial planning and control.  The project faces no special risks.  Cofinancing has been secured from the Italian Government ($10 million).

P003435.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第二电力项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的内容包括：（1）在徐州和上海之间架设500千伏输电线路；（2）建设五座变电站，提供配套设备、咨询服务和培训。通过促进发电站和电力需求中心之间的大容量输电，本项目努力支持华东地区工业发展。项目将转让超高压线和变电站设计、施工、运行维护、系统总体规划、投资规划以及财务规划和控制等方面的技术。本项目不存在特殊风险。意大利政府已决定提供联合融资（1000万美元）。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
